title: How to Make Mornay Sauce

steps.headline: Knead softened butter and flour together until smooth.
Add flour mixture to a saucepan and cook gently over low heat.
steps.description: Do not brown. The mixture should begin to look bubbly and smooth.

steps.headline: Cook until the sauce comes to a simmer.
Cook 15 minutes at a low simmer until the sauce thickens.
Add red pepper (cayenne pepper) to the white sauce mixture.
Add the grated cheese to the sauce mixture.
Heat through over a low flame.

text: White Sauce  Knead softened butter and flour together until smooth.  Add flour mixture to a saucepan and cook gently over low heat. Do not brown. The mixture should begin to look bubbly and smooth. Whisk in milk.  Cook until the sauce comes to a simmer.  Cook 15 minutes at a low simmer until the sauce thickens.  Mornay Sauce  Add red pepper (cayenne pepper) to the white sauce mixture.  Add the grated cheese to the sauce mixture. Whisk or stir to combine. Heat through over a low flame.
